# NG Dynamic Forms Core

## Installation
```
npm install @ng-dynamic-forms/core -S
```

## Import
```
@NgModule({

    imports: [
        // ...
        ReactiveFormsModule,
        DynamicFormsCoreModule.forRoot()

    ]
})

export class AppModule {}
```

## Resources

* [**API Documentation**](http://ng2-dynamic-forms.udos86.de/docs/core/)
